scripts.build: (cd ./packages/rapida-common && yarn run build) && (cd ./packages/postprocessing && yarn run build) && (cd ./packages/cannon-worker && yarn run build) && (cd ./packages/recs && yarn run build) && (cd ./packages/rapida && yarn run build)
scripts.test: (cd ./packages/rapida-common && yarn test) && (cd ./packages/rapida && yarn test) && (cd ./packages/recs && yarn test)
scripts.release: yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.storybook: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida && yarn run storybook" "cd ./packages/cannon-worker && yarn run storybook"
scripts.storybook:https: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida && yarn run storybook:https" "cd ./packages/cannon-worker && yarn run storybook:https"
scripts.storybook:prep-local-https: yarn run storybook:local-https-generate-ca && yarn run storybook:local-https-generate-crt
